lareneG
noitamrofnI
n·m -to- lb·in (in·lb), kg·cm
To calculate: N·m x 8·85 = lb·in • N·m x 10.20 = kg·cm
lb·in lb·in
n·m kg·cm n·m kg·cm
(in·lb) (in·lb)

2 18 20 27 239 275
3 27 31 28 248 286
4 35 41 29 257 296
5 44 51 30 266 306

7 62 71 32 283 326

11 97 112 36 319 367
12 106 122 37 327 377

14 124 143 39 345 398
15 133 153 40 354 408

21 186 214 46 407 469
22 195 224 47 416 479

24 212 245 49 434 500
25 221 255 50 443 510
n·cm -to- lb·in (in·lb), kg·cm
To calculate: N·cm x 0.089 = lb·in • N·cm x 0.102 = kg·cm
lb·in lb·in
n·cm kg·cm n·cm kg·cm
(in·lb) (in·lb)
50 4 5 250 22 25
60 5 6 300 27 31
70 6 7 350 31 36
80 7 8 400 35 41
90 8 9 450 40 46
100 9 10 500 44 51
110 10 11 550 49 56
120 11 12 600 53 61
130 12 13 650 58 66
140 12 14 700 62 71
150 13 15 750 66 76
160 14 16 800 71 82
170 15 17 850 75 87
180 16 18 900 80 92
190 17 19 950 84 97
200 18 20 1000 89 102
